body: This is NTR only by the absolute loosest definition, lol. The big sequential story has the dad passing the mom off to the son because dear ol' dad can't get it up and mom needs her dick fix.
Schmand Yet another pitiful shota hater trying to justify his hate by spewing shit from his asshole that passes for his mouth lol

Love bai asuka, but not gonna lie, this is pretty weak. NTR with shotas just seems pitiful after Youbo with interracial cucking. Shotas don't work as primary cuckers, they're more of a supportive role, like in Gekkakou no Ori.
